scripts.build:ui: rm -rf build && cd ../Full-Stack-Open-2019/osa2/puhelinluettelo/ && npm run build --prod && cp -r build ../../../Full-Stack-Open-2019-part3/
scripts.build-win:ui: rd -rs build && cd ../Full-Stack-Open-2019/osa2/puhelinluettelo/ && npm run build --prod && cp -r build ../../../Full-Stack-Open-2019-part3/
scripts.deploy:full: npm run build:ui && git add . && git commit -m uibuild && git push && npm run deploy
scripts.deploy-win:full: npm run build-win:ui && git add . && git commit -m uibuild && git push && npm run deploy
